thread.title: Hawaii Homes in Lava’s Path Were Built Decades Ago Despite Geologic Threat

author: Fatma Schwarz
title: Hawaii Homes in Lava’s Path Were Built Decades Ago Despite Geologic Threat
text:
Home » Hawaii Homes in Lava’s Path Were Built Decades Ago Despite Geologic Threat Hawaii Homes in Lava’s Path Were Built Decades Ago Despite Geologic Threat May 28, 2018
When Rob Holcombe and his husband purchased a studio on Hawaii’s Big Island in 2015, they knew it was in an lively volcano zone. gtag('config', 'UA-114047264-2');
But the Berkeley, Calif., couple had fallen in love with the place and gambled that molten lava would keep away from the forested getaway overlooking the Pacific that Mr. Holcombe describes as a “Garden of Eden.”
“We…
